name: Paladins Sky Whale Pack
description:
Ride aboard the Sky Whale Mount and patrol the sky-high seas of the Realm for loot and plunder!

You'll also get 200 Crystals as well as a Deal of the Day Token, which will unlock a daily personalized deal whenever you want!

The Sky Whale Pack Contains: The Sky Whale Mount 200 Crystals 1 Deal of the Day Token
